hopobject.name: GSTAS
hopobject.body:
Using an ARM-based processor, camera, gyros, IR markers, wireless connection, and a special motion sensing algorithm the GSTAS attempts to identify possible enemy and friendly targets while in motion.
The goal is to have a single fully self contained module that attaches to any mobile vehicle and sends real-time data on possible targets over a wireless connection.
hopobject.shortdesc: Gyro Stabilized Target Acquisition System's objective is to allow a stabilized remote camera to find both friendly (using IR markers) and possible enemy targets and report that information to a remote location. It's developed in C++.
